txt.en: The tapestry shred you have found is old and faded but some details can still be made out. Perhaps if you can find more, it would be of interest to the Rangers of Tinnudir.
'Look at how even after these years the colours have still retained their vibrance. I wonder if the pieces you found all belong to one tapestry or to many....'
'I wonder what they would have sewn into a tapestry from the days when the kingdom was at its height...'
The faded tapestries of Tham Nambarth tell of a heraldry long since lost to Evendim.
Tham Nambarth is east of Tinnudir.\n\nYou should seek scraps of ancient tapestries for the Rangers of Tinnudir.
Bring the tapestry pieces to Nadfaron
The Rangers are at Tinnudir, west of Tham Nambarth.\n\nOne of the Rangers at Tinnudir will be eager to examine the pieces of tapestry you collected.
